name: Welcome, Get Out!
description:
"Welcome, Get Out!" is a puzzle game where the cranky narrator really doesn't like you being there. It is a Point&Click comedy adventure that will take you through 7 different hand-crafted levels against the wishes of the sarcastic narrator who is trying to stop you from succeeding.

As you play, you'll click, drag, and tap your way through a variety of puzzles. The narrator will be discouraging, but if you listen closely, they will tell you how to complete the puzzle.

Will you best him?

Features

  • A Point&Click adventure. No need for a Keyboard or a Controller!
  • Touch screen support. Your finger is like a mouse, right?
  • Fully 2D graphics bundled with smooth animations.
  • Nearly fully voiced. So you can hear the sarcasm too!
  • A quick game. It can be finished in under an hour.

The Levels

  • The Main Menu - You need to start the game somehow too, right?
  • Rock Paper Scissors - Don't break anything.
  • Press The Button - Button Mashing Time!
  • The Box - Unlock it to find a way through.
  • The Clock - Even narrators need to know the time.
  • The Machine - I think it's missing some pieces.
  • The Code - Likely shouldn't touch that.

Festivals

  • This project was presented at Columbia College Chicago's Manifest 2021!
  • This project was also presented at Electrify! Esports, Education, Innovation 2021!
